description: Dive into "Sun-Kissed Shores of Rotterdam" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Sun-Kissed Shores of Rotterdam

reviews.text: Beautiful beach. Few people, ideal place to relax.
I love dogs but in the bathing season dogs shouldn't be allowed in!
Good to visit with your dog

places.generalDescription: Strand Nesselande is a beautiful and clean beach located by the Zevenhuizen lake, offering plenty of opportunities for enjoyment. Visitors can indulge in activities like water skiing and windsurfing, making it an ideal spot for outdoor enthusiasts. The area also features a lovely walking area and ample parking spaces along Sicilieboulevard. While the beach can get quite busy on warm days, its proximity to public transportation and shops adds to its convenience.
places.name: Strand Nesselande

reviews.text: Spacious parking place and relaxed playground. However if you want to make a walk around the whole lake, it's gonna take some time. ;)
Relatively less crowded and higher quality water, also it has a great view and gives a family friendly vibe. Supermarkets are also available closeby. Highly recommended.

Great beach with a long soft sand strip. Our kids enjoyed the water and the sand here. Parking lot is directly at the beach, with lots of parking space and it's free of charge. Lots of shopping options such as grocery store, clothing, food, and ice cream shops are right next to beach! We spent 2 afternoons here and we had a good time.

places.generalDescription: Beach House Het Kralingse Bos is a charming spot located near the beach area of Kralingse Plas. It offers various activities such as windsurfing, horseback riding, and cycling. The place has both a snack-takeaway area and a sit-down area with indoor and outdoor seating. Guests can enjoy delicious meals with top service and friendly staff.

sources.snippet: The biggest reason families visit Hoek van Holland with kids is because of the beach. We were positive about this beach, though. This beach is clean and expansive, and there is plenty of room to not lay hut to hut.
sources.siteName: REISKOE: BLOG OVER HET REIZEN MET KIND!
sources.shortName: Hoek van Holland with kids: family-friendly beach!

places.name: Beach House Het Kralingse Bos

reviews.text: Simple and tasty food.  Huge portion!  I could barely finish my salmon sandwich.  The portion size is great for the price.  We will definitely come here again, ü§û‚ù§Ô∏è

I had a disappointing experience here. I was speaking clear DUTCH, but the staff member seemed to intentionally misunderstand me - even trying to charge me for more items than I ordered. It wasn't busy at all (I was the only one ordering from the fast food side), yet she forgot my fries completely. Only when I returned 10 minutes later to ask if I could take them to go, did she finally put them in the fryer.

When I got them, she dumped the fries directly on top of the mayonnaise instead of beside it. I asked for salt and was told they had none - which I found odd for a burger and fries place. On top of that, she was whispering things under her breath and acted very unfriendly, even though I remained polite and patient the entire time.

Really unprofessional and unwelcoming service. I won't be returning.

What a great find, strategically located on the path around the lake, right next to a parking lot. Passed the place many times, not really thinking about it. Shockingly good burgers, fair prices, friendly staff, not much more you could ask for.

places.generalDescription: Uptown is a vibrant destination that truly captures the essence of a perfect day out. With its array of beach clubs lining the shores, each one more inviting than the last, visitors can indulge in delicious food and refreshing drinks while soaking up the sun. The atmosphere here is youthful and energetic, making it an ideal spot for both casual hangouts and leisurely brunches.

sources.snippet: What struck us most when we visited the beach at Hoek van Holland were the many beach clubs present at the beach. In total, there are about ten different beach clubs sitting side by side on the beach and one beach club is more beautiful than the other. So, of course, you can have some great food and drink here.
sources.siteName: REISKOE: BLOG OVER HET REIZEN MET KIND!
sources.shortName: Hoek van Holland with kids: family-friendly beach!

places.name: Uptown, Food & Drinks

reviews.text:
Excelente music and atmosphere. You can see the skyline, sunset and the river. It's really beautiful.
We had wine and beer and the mix bite. It was delicious.

Young in town, this place has very good potential to become a hot spot.
Nice food, modern stylish decor and a great location make it a good option. At the lunch rush hour the service is a bit slow, but it's not necessarily a problem.

I can't comment on the food, as I walked out of there due to the poor attitudes of the staff. After walking into an empty restaurant, someone arrived as grunted at me. I asked if the kitchen was open and could I sit. I barely got another grunt for this. No menus were offered, so I asked. After being given menus, I was asked what I wanted to drink. I said I was going alright and then I was told "You have to order a drink". I asked for tap water, and was told that there was no tap water. At this point, I was suitably annoyed and left.

Avoid this place.Dony pay to be treated like a burden.
